remarks: A cover is equivalent to a topology iff it is a base for that topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 8-Oct-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
topfneec.1 $e |- .~ = ( Fne i^i `' Fne ) $.
topfneec $p |- ( J e. Top -> ( A e. [ J ] .~ <-> ( topGen ` A ) = J ) ) $.
